rule: Each description must not portray the background or outline the setting of the subjects.
input: A group of friends enjoying a picnic in the park.
output: A vibrant group of four friends, laughing and chatting around a checkered blanket spread on lush green grass, shares a sunny afternoon picnic. Sunlight bathes them in warm golden hues, casting dancing shadows through the leaves of towering oak trees overhead. A wicker basket overflows with freshly baked bread, ripe fruit, and chilled drinks.  Amidst chirping birds and gentle breezes, their joyful laughter echoes through the park, capturing the carefree spirit of summer friendship.
